typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VAActors
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FCActors
FCActors, VAActors union(byName: true)~> MergeVAFC
MergeVAFC derive(ActorName = case(isNull(ActorName),'Unknown Actor Name',ActorName),
		Gender = case(isNull(Gender),'U',Gender)) ~> NullChecks
NullChecks keyGenerate(output(ActorSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(input(
		{02e7ebe8-e09c-40f5-ba46-ab465bd0f73f} as string,
		Kelemen as string,
		Orsos as string,
		{5555550673} as string,
		{2017-01-03 00:00:00.00000004} as string,
		{2017-01-03 00:00:00.00000005} as string,
		SR as string,
		{3d034f2a-b657-4c80-b312-6adb8e1c99b8} as string,
		{155 Pine St} as string,
		Prop_9 as string,
		Portland as string,
		OR as string,
		{85101} as string,
		{1} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OutletToDLPREP
